The documentary had a significant impact on the cultural conversation surrounding abortion by shedding light on the complex and often emotional issue, bringing attention to many different perspectives, and raising awareness about the ongoing struggle for access to reproductive healthcare. The documentary also gave a voice to women who have had abortions, as well as to doctors, activists, and other experts in the field. Overall, "Reversing Roe" contributed to a broader conversation about equality, healthcare, and human rights, and strengthened the movement towards reproductive justice for all.
